path: artifacts/SaiyanDoge Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.SaiyanDoge: contracts/SaiyanDoge Full Smart Contract Security Audit/SaiyanDoge

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions includeInReward and _getCurrentSupply may be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Owner has permissions to change tax and liquidity fee, maximum transaction amount, and exclude from the fee.
